::CyberShark::

    Sensing something wrong he walked up behind Feline, and=
 sneared at the other bot, supposedly called "Unitron"
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: logomorph@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=
: Thursday, October 05, 2000 7:06 AM
  Subject: Re: Intruders...or friends?=



  ::Feline::
  "STOP! DON"T SHOOT! HotRod is on our side now.  He's with=
 me." She 
  stepped in front of HotRod and looked at Unitron. "He's now wi=
th us. 
  Lower your weapon please."  She gave him a warm smile and purred =

  softly, turning on her charms and hoping Untron would calm down a bit.

=


  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
  > Nemesis Enforcer/S=
cattershot/Unitron:
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > The three robots headed for the Alli=
ance bridge, Unitron wanting to 
  talk 
  > about certain things, and the =
other two...well, they were just 
  crazy.
  > 
  > Unitron stopped as he s=
aw Hot Rod, only his colors were different.  
  A rage 
  > and hate boiled=
 up in him, and he raised his hands to stop the 
  other two 
  > robots.
 =
 > 
  > "What!" Nemesis said loudly.
  > 
  > "That is Hot Rod.  An Autobot=
...or rather, a Maximal.  Or an 
  impostor."
  > 
  > "Yeah, whazzzz your =
point?" Scattershot said quickly.
  > 
  > "Hot Rod killed Unicron.  He's a=
 good guy, to make it easy to 
  understand for 
  > you."
  > 
  > "Rehehe=
heally?" 
  > 
  > "Yes."
  > 
  > "In that case..." Nemesis Enforcer drew =
his rapid-firing laser 
  rifle, taking 
  > aim at Hot Rod's torso.
  > 
 =
 > "Well...I reckon this varmint better get hog-tied and eaten by wild 
  b=
anshees, 
  > partners."
  > 
  > The other two Alliance members looked ove=
r to Scattershot.
  > 
  > "Good one!" Nemesis said, high-fiving Scattersho=
t, as Scattershot 
  took out 
  > his automatic rifle, taking aim at Hot R=
od.
  > 
  > Unitron could see Feline with Hot Rod, but ignored it. He rais=
ed 
  both of his 
  > laser rifles at Hot Rod, pulling the trigger twice f=
or each weapon, 
  his 
  > hatred for Autobots in general, and especially =
Hot Rod overriding 
  his logic 
  > circuitry.
